articles.author: Timothy Nerozzi
articles.title: 79-year-old US tourist killed by bull elephant while on Zambian safari - Fox News
articles.description: An American tourist was killed by a bull elephant in Kafue National Park in Zambia after the titanic animal chased down a safari group's vehicle and flipped it with its tusks.
articles.content:
A tourist from the United States was killed by a bull elephant last week during an African safari. 
Gail Mattson, 79, died Saturday after being attacked at the Kafue National Park in Zambia. Mattson… [+2405 chars]

articles.author: Jacqueline Howard
articles.title: As the world ages, cancer cases are projected to rise, hitting some countries like ‘a tidal wave’ - CNN
articles.description: Around the world each year, tens of millions of people are told they have cancer, and millions die from the disease. Now, a report from the American Cancer Society projects that by 2050, the number of people with cancer could rise 77%.
articles.content: Around the world each year, tens of millions of people are told they have cancer, and millions die from the disease. Now, a report from the American Cancer Society projects that by 2050, the number o… [+8971 chars]
